General.Name: Prima Moda SA
General.Description: Prima Moda S.A. engages in the sale of women's and men's footwear and complementary products in specialized stores in Poland. The company offers formal, weekend, and everyday shoes, as well as casual sports models, handbags, leather goods, and shoe care products. It offers its products through online store, multi-brand online platforms, and stationary stores. Prima Moda S.A. was founded in 1992 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Jaroslaw  Jakubowski
1.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board and Member of the Supervisory Board
